quest.name: The Way Home
journal: Krile can see the steely resolve in your eyes, and suspects she knows to where duty calls you.
objectives: Speak with the Crystal Exarch in the Ocular.

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: I take it you're ready to return to the First?

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: Then I would ask that you apprise the others of recent events here in the Source. Namely, Zenos's return and the development of a new Ultima Weapon. As for their bodies, you may assure them Master Matoya and I will continue doing what we can to keep their corporeal aether stable.

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: Safe travels, Forename. I hope to see you, and the other Scions, soon.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: You've come at a most opportune time, my friend. I've made something of a breakthrough in my research on the soul and a means to return the Scions home. I trust you too have been making good use of your time?

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Ill tidings from the Source, you say?

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Then I will summon the others that we might all be apprised of the situation.
